mapper.sql: SELECT post_id, title, content, user_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM forum_post
mapper.select:
SELECT p.post_id, p.title, p.content, p.user_id, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time, u.user_name FROM forum_post p LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.status = '0'
AND p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
SELECT p.post_id, p.title, p.content, p.user_id, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time, u.user_name FROM forum_post p LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
